A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without spoilers.  Lazy writing\, uninteresting characters\, exponential plot holes\, non-menacing Sith.  More Mary Sue'ing.  The #1 thing that spoiled the movie for me is the over-politicization of the film.  There were a couple of good scenes\, which is why this even a 2 star (would be 1/5 otherwise).   So many missed opportunities for greatness or at least coherence in this film.  Jar Jar would be a welcome change of pace.
